Perceptor::


"I heard you loud and clear, Wolfstein!" replied Perceptor "I'm going 
towards your position" and Looking to MEgatron "If you alow me, 
master, I'll bring him there 'cause he wants join us..."





--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> ::Wolfenstein::
> 
> Not far from the Predacon base powerful ghusts of wind blow as the 
Warpstar's thrusters allow the ship to land slowly and softly.
> 
> A scanning device emerges from the top of the ship and scans the 
landscape and any living creatures. The scanner picks up a wolf not 
far, and takes in the design. Soon Wolfenstein is outfitted with the 
alternate form of a wolf.
> 
> Now that this process is complete Wolfenstein is ready to join the 
Predacons. He activates the commlink again.
> 
> "Perceptor, you still there? This is Wolfenstein. I have landed not 
far from your base."
